mn147:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn147:1.3: Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa patisallinassa evam cetaso parivitakko udapadi:
mn147:1.5: Yannunaham rahulam uttarim asavanam khaye vineyyan”ti.
mn147:1.6: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisi.
mn147:1.7: Savatthiyam pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto ayasmantam rahulam amantesi:
mn147:1.10: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma rahulo bhagavato patissutva nisidanam adaya bhagavantam pitthito pitthito anubandhi.
mn147:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena anekani devatasahassani bhagavantam anubandhani honti:
mn147:2.2: “ajja bhagava ayasmantam rahulam uttarim asavanam khaye vinessati”ti.
mn147:2.3: Atha kho bhagava andhavanam ajjhogahetva annatarasmim rukkhamule pannatte asane nisidi.
mn147:2.4: Ayasmapi kho rahulo bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
mn147:2.5: Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam rahulam bhagava etadavoca:

mn147:9.1: “Evam passam, rahula, sutava ariyasavako cakkhusmim nibbindati, rupesu nibbindati, cakkhuvinnane nibbindati, cakkhusamphasse nibbindati, yamidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedanagatam sannagatam sankharagatam vinnanagatam tasmimpi nibbindati.
mn147:9.6: manasmim nibbindati, dhammesu nibbindati, manovinnane nibbindati, manosamphasse nibbindati, yamidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedanagatam sannagatam sankharagatam vinnanagatam tasmimpi nibbindati.
mn147:9.7: Nibbindam virajjati, viraga vimuccati. Vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
mn147:9.8: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
mn147:9.10: Attamano ayasma rahulo bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
mn147:9.11: Imasminca pana veyyakaranasmim bhannamane ayasmato rahulassa anupadaya asavehi cittam vimucci.
